privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy briefly describes how we collect, use and protect personal data from visitors and customers. Demonstration content.

sections.title: 1. Data Collected
sections.body: We collect data you provide directly (e.g. name, email, phone) plus minimal technical logs required for operation and security. We do not sell data.

sections.title: 2. Purposes
list: Provision and maintenance of the contracted service.

sections.title: 3. Data Subject Rights
sections.body: You may request access, correction, portability or deletion of your data subject to legal retention obligations.

sections.title: 4. Security
sections.body: We adopt reasonable technical and organizational controls. No transmission is 100% secure but we strive to reduce risks.

sections.title: 5. Retention
sections.body: Data is kept only as long as needed for stated purposes or legal requirements.

privacy.disclaimer: Demonstration document. Final version requires legal review (LGPD/GDPR).

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern the use of our connectivity services. Demonstration text.

sections.title: 1. Service
sections.body: We provide internet access on a best-effort basis according to the subscribed plan.

sections.title: 2. Acceptable Use
sections.body: Use for unlawful, offensive, copyright infringing or intrusion activities is forbidden.

sections.title: 3. Responsibilities
sections.body: User must protect devices and credentials; we are not liable for malware on client equipment.

sections.title: 4. Suspension
sections.body: Service may be temporarily suspended for maintenance or policy violation with notice when possible.

sections.title: 5. Changes
sections.body: Updates may occur; continued use means acceptance of the current version.

terms.disclaimer: Demonstration only. Final terms depend on legal and regulatory review (Anatel / LGPD).

cookies.title: Cookies & Technologies
cookies.intro: We explain in simple terms which cookies and similar technologies we may use.

sections.title: 1. Types of Cookies
list: Essential: required for basic functionality and security.
Performance: help us understand aggregated usage.

sections.title: 2. Control
sections.body: You can clear or block cookies in your browser. Disabling essential ones may impact functionality.

sections.title: 3. Lightweight Analytics
sections.body: We use a lightweight internal analytics solution without identifying users individually.

cookies.disclaimer: Demonstration only. Real policy may include third-party details and explicit consent mechanisms.
